title: Federated Few-Shot Learning for Epileptic Seizure Detection Under Privacy Constraints
summary: Many deep learning approaches have been developed for EEG-based seizure detection; however, most rely on access to large centralized annotated datasets. In clinical practice, EEG data are often scarce, patient-specific distributed across institutions, and governed by strict privacy regulations that prohibit data pooling.
